ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SKIBOTN GEOS-2 : ULF Search Coil Ground Based Data Level 2 (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This Level 2 dataset contains magnetic field components depending on time, given in NWV Coordinate System in nT units. The NWV Coordinate System is defined as follows: the Z component is vertical outward, the X component is towards North and Y is towards West. Correspondence with VDH system is: V=Z, D=-Y, H=X. The dataset is in CDF format.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Data provided are publicly available. If used in presentations or publications, please acknowledge CDPP (Centre de DonnÃ©es de la Physique des Plasmas) and P. Robert (LPP) for producing original data and calibrated waveforms.

Parameter.Name: ULF magnetic field  measured at Skibotn ground station
Parameter.Description:
ULF magnetic field  measured at Skibotn ground station (in coordination with GEOS-2) in the range (0.05 - 11.63 Hz) and recorded  with a sample rate of  23.25 Hz.
The typical sensitivities are : 0.1 gamma/Hz at 0.1 Hz and 0.0002 gamma/Hz at 10  Hz. The dynamic range of  the telemetry is 72 dB.
